wordpressPost.title: Fart fetish
wordpressPost.content:
Fart fetishism is very close to fecophilia if you ask me – some people have both or either. As I've had the pleasure(?) of finding out I have neither, or at least I don't have a fart fetish. Yes it's kind of an interesting thing to try, but definitely not arousing in any way …

Uhm … yes, all things need to be tried out at least once, but only some things need to be done more than once. On top of that I don't really have much to say at this time … this could be a nice essay-ish lengthy write up, but somehow my mind doesn't feel like thinking. More tea is required methinks.
